text: But they can rest easy. I'm on the job.
text_simple: but they can rest easy im on the job

name: snapfire_outlands_05
text: So, yeah. HERE ya call 'em the Outlands, but they all got names.
text_simple: so yeah here ya call em the outlands but they all got names

name: snapfire_outlands_06
text: Like Praxa'cia. That's my favorite. Krimwohl tho, they can suck iron.
text_simple: like praxacia thats my favorite krimwohl tho they can suck iron

name: snapfire_outlands_07
text: Never saw any other folk like myself. There were some with similarities, but they didn't have much knack for tinkering.
text_simple: never saw any other folk like myself there were some with similarities but they didnt have much knack for tinkering

name: snapfire_outlands_08
text: So of course my wares were always in demand.
text_simple: so of course my wares were always in demand

name: snapfire_outlands_09
text: At first I'd sell to anyone buying. Principles don't get you out of a tight spot--and I sure was in one after crossin the marsh.
text_simple: at first id sell to anyone buying principles dont get you out of a tight spotand i sure was in one after crossin the marsh

name: snapfire_outlands_10
text: Course, lacking convictions while simultaneously manufacturing weapons of mass murder is a purty good way to find yourself in cahoots with a bad bunch.
text_simple: course lacking convictions while simultaneously manufacturing weapons of mass murder is a purty good way to find yourself in cahoots with a bad bunch

name: snapfire_outlands_11
text: And me being me, I found the worst.
text_simple: and me being me i found the worst

name: snapfire_road_01
text: We had a good run of years, truth be told. Road Agents aren't known for longevity.
text_simple: we had a good run of years truth be told road agents arent known for longevity

name: snapfire_road_02
text: Even the best gangs will fall to pieces from excessive death or in-fighting.
text_simple: even the best gangs will fall to pieces from excessive death or infighting

name: snapfire_road_03
text: I wasn't needlessly cruel, but I did get my hands dirty. And I supplied armaments to folks who caused real harm.
text_simple: i wasnt needlessly cruel but i did get my hands dirty and i supplied armaments to folks who caused real harm

name: snapfire_road_04
text: While I'm sure there's something to learn from it, most days I feel the less said about those days, the better.
text_simple: while im sure theres something to learn from it most days i feel the less said about those days the better

name: snapfire_mortimer_01
text: I'm not gonna lie. I didn't know what I had when I first snatched this little feller up.
text_simple: im not gonna lie i didnt know what i had when i first snatched this little feller up

name: snapfire_mortimer_02
text: Heck, it was more of a joke n' anything. Even givin him a name -- Mortimer! Just a little nugget in my hand.
text_simple: heck it was more of a joke n anything even givin him a name mortimer just a little nugget in my hand

name: snapfire_mortimer_03
text: Sure, we all joshed I was his mammy, but I really thought we were gonna eat him when he got a little bigger. Which he did, rapidly.
text_simple: sure we all joshed i was his mammy but i really thought we were gonna eat him when he got a little bigger which he did rapidly

name: snapfire_mortimer_04
text: Wouldn't ya know it, I fell in love with the big goof.
text_simple: wouldnt ya know it i fell in love with the big goof

name: snapfire_mortimer_05
text: Along with that feeling came...some semblence of personal responsibility.
text_simple: along with that feeling came some semblence of personal responsibility

name: snapfire_mortimer_06
text: Warn't long before me and the gang had a HARD falling out.
text_simple: warnt long before me and the gang had a hard falling out

name: snapfire_mortimer_07
text: But I got all the gang I need right here.
text_simple: but i got all the gang i need right here

name: snapfire_mortimer_08
text: I later learned these lizards got QUITE the life expectancy.
text_simple: i later learned these lizards got quite the life expectancy

name: snapfire_mortimer_09
text: So long as I don't get the both of us killed, he'll long outlive me.
text_simple: so long as i dont get the both of us killed hell long outlive me

name: snapfire_mortimer_10
text: But I know he'll find someone else when I'm gone -- who needs his help just as much as I did.
text_simple: but i know hell find someone else when im gone who needs his help just as much as i did

name: snapfire_mortimer_11
text: And they'll be thankful to have him. Yep.
text_simple: and theyll be thankful to have him yep

name: snapfire_smithing_01
text: I've said it before, I'll say it a million times. Powder ain't magic. It's art. And the powder ganger is the artist.
text_simple: ive said it before ill say it a million times powder aint magic its art and the powder ganger is the artist

name: snapfire_smithing_02
text: I only really started making guns to ensure the quality of the smithing matched the quality of my pretty black dust.
text_simple: i only really started making guns to ensure the quality of the smithing matched the quality of my pretty black dust

name: snapfire_smithing_03
text: You won't see a master painter scrawlin' with a shop-bought brush.
text_simple: you wont see a master painter scrawlin with a shopbought brush

name: snapfire_smithing_04
text: Well, once I had both the iron and the load, I made my way with 'em.
text_simple: well once i had both the iron and the load i made my way with em

name: snapfire_smithing_05
text: Selling 'em when I had or wanted to... and turning 'em loose on those I thought deserved it.
text_simple: selling em when i had or wanted to and turning em loose on those i thought deserved it

name: snapfire_smithing_06
text: But that was a long time ago. Now I'm more...judicious in applying my talents.
text_simple: but that was a long time ago now im more judicious in applying my talents

name: snapfire_baking_01
text: For a spell there, I didn't want to have anything to do with smithing or killing.
text_simple: for a spell there i didnt want to have anything to do with smithing or killing

name: snapfire_baking_02
text: But a keen's idle hands are liable to rig up something even worse.
text_simple: but a keens idle hands are liable to rig up something even worse

name: snapfire_baking_03
text: So I turned to baking. Cookies are my specialty -- largely on account of being my favorite.
text_simple: so i turned to baking cookies are my specialty largely on account of being my favorite

name: snapfire_baking_04
text: But ride with me long enough and you might sample the odd snickerdoodle or taste some crumble pie.
text_simple: but ride with me long enough and you might sample the odd snickerdoodle or taste some crumble pie

name: snapfire_baking_05
text: I even found a way to apply some of my previous talents in whipping up an effective new recipe.
text_simple: i even found a way to apply some of my previous talents in whipping up an effective new recipe

name: snapfire_baking_06
text: I do hope you'll try some. It'll make ya feel right as rain.
text_simple: i do hope youll try some itll make ya feel right as rain

name: snapfire_home_01
text: It's strange coming home. One of my big sisters settled in the vale -- but that's all gone now.
text_simple: its strange coming home one of my big sisters settled in the vale but thats all gone now

name: snapfire_home_02
text: Her little snipper's still runnin' around, but he's... had a hard time of it.
text_simple: her little snippers still runnin around but hes had a hard time of it

name: snapfire_home_03
text: I see some of the old keen around a bit--the ones that survived. But they're still scared of me like back in the day.
text_simple: i see some of the old keen around a bitthe ones that survived but theyre still scared of me like back in the day

name: snapfire_home_04
text: And while I do assert that their remembrances are a might exaggerated, I will own up to a smidge of impropriety at a young age--
text_simple: and while i do assert that their remembrances are a might exaggerated i will own up to a smidge of impropriety at a young age

name: snapfire_home_05
text: I was just trying to find my place in the world.
text_simple: i was just trying to find my place in the world

name: snapfire_home_06
text: If they think I was bad back then, I should give 'em a taste of what come after. Hehe!
text_simple: if they think i was bad back then i should give em a taste of what come after hehe

name: snapfire_home_07
text: Anywho, I don't know how long I'll stick around.
text_simple: anywho i dont know how long ill stick around

name: snapfire_home_08
text: There's trouble brewing, and if I've learned anything, a trusty iron on your side can make all the difference.
text_simple: theres trouble brewing and if ive learned anything a trusty iron on your side can make all the difference

name: snapfire_rare_01
text: Some folk are content just to have a roof over head n' kin to hold. But I gave all that up years ago. Yep, got everything I need right here.
text_simple: some folk are content just to have a roof over head n kin to hold but i gave all that up years ago yep got everything i need right here

name: snapfire_rare_02
text: I've been around a few places n' one thing I learned: you got plans, you got contingencies, and you got the ace up your sleeve when the first two go belly up.
text_simple: ive been around a few places n one thing i learned you got plans you got contingencies and you got the ace up your sleeve when the first two go belly up
